name: Connected Worlds (impe83)
description:
I "completed" this game in about... 8hours? yes, it was my first LD, with a LOT of pauses, checkin the official blog to see what people are doing and looking for some guides.. 

The game is broken, its not fun, since is not completed.. my concept was, your gf is talking to you, but you are using your phone all the time, you have to click to close some facebook, twitter notifications while shes talking to you and she asking you stuff from time to time and you just have to say yes.. yep, that was the concept for connect worlds! :D

Feel free to suggest improvements or how I should have done it lol!

This LD challenge was a great experience, I learned some extra tricks for C2 (which im gonna use to make other games) and I feel that every broken game I make brings me closer to a real game!
